A

add(String, String...) - Method in class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringInterceptors
Retrieves an interceptor from the Spring ApplicationContext and delegates the call to the Interceptors.add(Interceptor, String...) method.

I

init(ServletConfig) - Method in class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringControllerLoader
 
initialize(ServletConfig) - Method in class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringInterceptors
 
initialize() - Method in class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringInterceptors
This method is implemented by concrete SpringInterceptor classes calling the SpringInterceptors.add(String, String...) method to add interceptors.

load(String) - Method in class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringControllerLoader

org.jogger.config.spring - package org.jogger.config.spring

setApplicationContext(ApplicationContext) - Method in class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringControllerLoader
 
setApplicationContext(ApplicationContext) - Method in class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringInterceptors
 
SpringControllerLoader - Class in org.jogger.config.spring
This is a ControllerLoader implementation based on the Spring Framework.
SpringControllerLoader() - Constructor for class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringControllerLoader
 
SpringInterceptors - Class in org.jogger.config.spring
This is Interceptors implementation that exposes the SpringInterceptors.add(String, String...) method that allows subclasses to add declared beans as interceptors.
SpringInterceptors() - Constructor for class org.jogger.config.spring.SpringInterceptors
